Player History
Had first career hit on 3/31/2013, off Justin Masterson (CLE)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/2013, off Scott Kazmir (CLE)...
1/30/2015: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 3/11/2015 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2015, hitting .370 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
1/30/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,807,143 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
1/30/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,050,000 through salary arbitration...
10/1/2017: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $12,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Injured on 3/17/2019 with a Fractured Knee, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 3/2/2021 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Seattle in 2021...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/18/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $20,000,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 5/3/2022...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2022, hitting .344 with 7 HR, 24 RBI...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Traded from Seattle to New York (N) on 7/21/2022 (Going to NYM: C Jesus Montero, P Danny Farquhar. Going to SEA: C Wilin Rosario, LF Martin Prado, P Burl Cullen, P James Lindsey)...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (A) on 2/2/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $12,000,000 per year...
Hit 3 homeruns against San Francisco, driving in 6 runs on 7/6/2024...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/1/2026 to a 2-year deal worth $3,750,000 per year...
Released by Philadelphia on 4/3/2027...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 4/17/2027 to a 1-year deal worth $528,000 per year...
